code: import React from"react";import Button from"./Button";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function toHoursAndMinutes(totalSeconds){var totalMinutes=Math.floor(totalSeconds/60);var seconds=totalSeconds%60;var hours=Math.floor(totalMinutes/60);var minutes=totalMinutes%60;if(hours==0&&minutes==0){return"".concat(seconds,"s");}else if(hours==0){return"".concat(minutes,"m").concat(seconds,"s");}else{return"".concat(hours,"hr").concat(minutes,"m").concat(seconds,"s");}}var RideList=function RideList(_ref){var rides=_ref.rides,selectRide=_ref.selectRide;var count=0;var rideListItems=rides.map(function(ride){if(ride.segments){count+=1;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rounded-md m-2 p-5 bg-white",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center justify-center mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-base font-bold text-purple-800",children:ride.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"w-full whitespace-no-wrap text-center text-gray-500",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"text-s font-semibold tracking-wide text-center  uppercase border-b",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Segment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Segment time"})]}),ride.segments.map(function(segment){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:segment.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:toHoursAndMinutes(segment.segmentTime)})]},segment.name);})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex justify-end",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{color:"bg-purple-300 text-gray-700 rounded-md p-1",onClick:function onClick(){selectRide(ride);},text:"Select this ride"})})]},Math.floor(Math.random()*100000));}return null;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[rideListItems,count<1&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You have no applicable rides."})]});};export default RideList;
